title: Englishpod 初级 英文播客 0007

segments.en: Hello, English learners, and welcome to EnglishPod.
segments.cn: 你好，英语学习者，欢迎来到EnglishPod。

segments.en: My name is Marco.
And I'm Erica.
Hey, Erica.
How are you today?
Marco, I am doing really well, and I'm really looking forward to today's lesson.
segments.cn: Marco，我很好，我非常期待今天的课程。

segments.en: Well, so am I, because here at EnglishPod, we're giving you real English.
segments.cn: 我也是，因为在EnglishPod，我们给你真实的英语。

segments.en: Everyday English.
Exactly.
English that you hear in movies or in TV shows.
segments.cn: 电影或电视节目中听到的英语。

segments.en: This is English people actually use.
segments.cn: 这是人们实际使用的英语。

segments.en: So, Erica, what is our topic for today?
segments.cn: 那么，Erica，今天我们的主题是什么？

segments.en: Well, today we're talking about computer viruses.
segments.cn: 今天我们要谈论计算机病毒。

segments.en: Perfect.
So, I think it's time for us to take a look at our preview.
segments.cn: 我想是时候看看我们的预览了。

segments.en: Vocabulary Preview.
Okay, today we've got two words to preview.
segments.cn: 好的，今天我们有两个词要预览。

segments.en: The first word is virus.
Virus.
Virus.
Virus.
So, if your computer has a computer virus, it means your computer is sick, right?
segments.cn: 所以，如果你的电脑有病毒，意味着你的电脑生病了，对吗？

segments.en: Actually, a computer virus is a program that is designed to harm or to damage your computer.
segments.cn: 实际上，计算机病毒是一个旨在损害或破坏你电脑的程序。

segments.en: Oh, I see.
Okay.
Well, thank you for being so technical.
That's the technical explanation.
Okay, let's take a look at our second word for our preview today, and that would be froze.
segments.cn: 好的，让我们看看今天预览的第二个词，那就是冻结。

segments.en: Froze.
Froze.
Froze.
So, if your computer froze, it means that your computer stopped working.
segments.cn: 所以，如果你的电脑冻结了，意味着你的电脑停止工作。

segments.en: Your applications or your programs stopped working and you just can't do anything.
segments.cn: 你的应用程序或程序停止工作，你什么也做不了。

segments.en: Your computer is broken.
Okay, great.
So, let's listen to our dialogue.
segments.cn: 现在，让我们听听我们的对话。

segments.en: It's gonna be a little bit fast, but... Don't worry if you don't understand everything.
segments.cn: 会有点快，但... 如果你不理解所有内容也不用担心。

segments.en: At the end of this podcast, you'll understand everything.
segments.cn: 在这个播客结束时，你会理解一切。

segments.en: Perfect.
Let's listen.
Oh, great.
The stupid computer froze again.
segments.cn: 这该死的电脑又冻结了。

segments.en: That's the third time today.
Hey, Samuel, can you come take a look at my PC?
segments.cn: 嘿，Samuel，你能来看看我的电脑吗？

segments.en: It's acting up again.
It must have a virus or something.
segments.cn: 可能有病毒或其他问题。

segments.en: Just give me a second.
I'll be right up.
I ran a virus scan on your computer and it turns out that you have a lot of infected files.
segments.cn: 我对你的电脑进行了病毒扫描，结果发现你有很多感染的文件。

segments.en: But I'm quite careful when I'm browsing the Internet.
segments.cn: 但我在上网时非常小心。

segments.en: I have no idea how I could have picked up a virus.
segments.cn: 我不知道我是怎么感染病毒的。

segments.en: Well, you have to make sure their antivirus software is updated regularly.
segments.cn: 嗯，你必须确保你的杀毒软件定期更新。

segments.en: Yours wasn't up to date.
That's probably what was causing your problems.
segments.cn: 这可能是导致你问题的原因。

segments.en: Okay, anything else?
Yeah, try not to kick or hit the computer.
segments.cn: 是的，尽量不要踢或打电脑。

segments.en: Um, yeah, sorry about that.
Well, I completely understand this guy.
segments.cn: 嗯，我完全理解这个家伙。

segments.en: When my computer freezes, I kick it and punch it and do everything to it.
segments.cn: 当我的电脑冻结时，我会踢它、打它，做任何事情。

segments.en: Well, I hope you don't punch it too hard, Marco.
segments.cn: 嗯，我希望你不要打得太狠，Marco。

segments.en: Well, it's still working, so it's alright.
segments.cn: 嗯，它还在工作，所以没关系。

segments.en: Okay.
Alright, let's take a look at our language takeaway.
segments.cn: 好吧，让我们看看我们的语言要点。

segments.en: Language takeaway.
In today's language takeaway, we have two words.
segments.cn: 在今天的语言要点中，我们有两个词。

segments.en: The first word for today is infected file.
segments.cn: 今天的第一个词是感染文件。

segments.en: Infected file.
Infected file.
Infected file.
And what is an infected file?
An infected file is a file in your computer that has a virus in it.
segments.cn: 感染文件是你电脑中含有病毒的文件。

segments.en: Ah, perfect.
That's really clear.
What is our second word for the language takeaway today?
segments.cn: 今天语言要点的第二个词是什么？

segments.en: Our second word is not up-to-date.
segments.cn: 我们的第二个词是未更新。

segments.en: Not up-to-date.
And what is it when something is not up-to-date?
segments.cn: 当某物未更新时是什么意思？

segments.en: It means it doesn't have all the most recent information.
segments.cn: 意味着它没有最新的信息。

segments.en: Okay, perfect.
Now let's listen to some examples.
segments.cn: 现在让我们听一些例子。

segments.en: Example one.
I need to buy a new computer because mine isn't up-to-date.
segments.cn: 我需要买一台新电脑，因为我的电脑没有更新。

segments.en: Example two.
I can't find the street.
Are you sure this map is up-to-date?
segments.cn: 你确定这张地图是最新的吗？

segments.en: Example three.
Sarah has just finished the reports and all the information is up-to-date.
segments.cn: Sarah刚完成报告，所有信息都是最新的。

segments.en: Okay, that was pretty clear.
You know, you can also use this phrase positively.
segments.cn: 你知道，你也可以积极地使用这个短语。

segments.en: You can say up-to-date.
Okay, for example, we can say this is a new map.
segments.cn: 好的，例如，我们可以说这是张新地图。

segments.en: This is the most up-to-date map.
Exactly, or if I bought a new computer, I could say I just got a new computer.
segments.cn: 正是，或者如果我买了一台新电脑，我可以说我刚买了一台新电脑。

segments.en: All my software is up-to-date.
segments.cn: 我所有的软件都是最新的。

segments.en: Okay, great.
So now let's take a look at some phrases.
segments.cn: 现在让我们看看一些短语。

segments.en: And it's time for putting it all together.
segments.cn: 是时候把所有内容整合在一起了。

segments.en: Putting it together.
Okay, so Samuel said a really great phrase.
segments.cn: 好的，Samuel说了一个很好的短语。

segments.en: He said, I'll be right up.
I'll be right up.
I'll be right up.
I'll be right up.
Now, we can use this phrase in a lot of different situations.
segments.cn: 现在，我们可以在很多不同的情况下使用这个短语。

segments.en: So let's listen to some examples.
segments.cn: 所以让我们听一些例子。

segments.en: Example one.
Can you help me with my computer?
I'll be right there.
Example two.
Come downstairs.
Dinner is ready.
I'll be right down.
Example three.
Hurry up!
I need to use the bathroom.
I'll be right out.
Okay, really great and clear examples, right?
segments.cn: 好的，真的很好的例子，对吧？

segments.en: Yeah, you know that phrase, I'll be right out?
segments.cn: 是的，你知道那个短语，我马上就出来？

segments.en: I used to hear this all the time when I was young.
segments.cn: 我年轻的时候总是听到这个。

segments.en: Really?
How come?
Well, I have two sisters and we were always fighting for the bathroom.
segments.cn: 嗯，我有两个姐妹，我们总是争厕所。

segments.en: So someone was always saying, just a minute, I'll be right out.
segments.cn: 所以总有人在说，等一下，我马上就出来。

segments.en: Yes, that's common.
I had that too when I was young.
Okay, now our second phrase is, it turns out that.
segments.cn: 好的，现在我们的第二个短语是，结果是。

segments.en: It turns out that.
It turns out that.
It turns out that.
This is a great phrase, you can use it in many different situations.
segments.cn: 这是一个很好的短语，你可以在很多不同的情况下使用。

segments.en: Marco, can you give us an example?
segments.cn: 马尔科，你能给我们一个例子吗？

segments.en: Sure, for example, I can say, Frank didn't come to work today and it turns out that he was sick.
segments.cn: 当然，比如，我可以说，弗兰克今天没来上班，结果他生病了。

segments.en: Yep, or I could say, oh, I've been feeling really sick recently.
segments.cn: 是的，或者我可以说，哦，我最近感觉很不舒服。

segments.en: Why?
It turns out that I'm pregnant.
Oh my god, are you really pregnant?
segments.cn: 哦我的天，你真的怀孕了吗？

segments.en: No, I'm not, I'm just kidding.
segments.cn: 不，我不是，我只是开玩笑。

segments.en: Alright, cuz.
Okay, so it's time for us to listen to our dialogue again, but this time it'll be a little bit slower.
segments.cn: 好的，现在是时候再听一次我们的对话了，但这次会慢一点。

segments.en: Alright.
Oh, great.
This stupid computer froze again.
segments.cn: 这台愚蠢的电脑又卡住了。

segments.en: That's the third time today.
Hey, Samuel, can you come take a look at my PC?
segments.cn: 嘿，塞缪尔，你能来看看我的电脑吗？

segments.en: It's acting up again.
It must have a virus or something.
segments.cn: 可能有病毒或其他问题。

segments.en: Just give me a second, I'll be right up.
segments.cn: 给我一秒钟，我马上就来。

segments.en: I ran a virus scan on your computer and it turns out that you have a lot of infected files.
segments.cn: 我对你的电脑进行了病毒扫描，结果你有很多感染的文件。

segments.en: But I'm quite careful when I'm browsing the Internet.
I have to make sure that your anti-virus software is updated regularly.
segments.cn: 我必须确保你的防病毒软件定期更新。

segments.en: Yours wasn't up to date.
That's probably what was causing your problems.
segments.cn: 这可能是导致你问题的原因。

segments.en: Okay, anything else?
Yeah, try not to kick or hit the computer.
segments.cn: 是的，尽量不要踢或打电脑。

segments.en: Um, yeah, sorry about that.
Okay, that was a lot more clear this time.
Definitely, yeah, I understood a lot more.
segments.cn: 绝对是的，我理解得多了。

segments.en: Okay, so now it's time to look at Fluency Builder.
segments.cn: 好的，现在是时候看看流利度构建器了。

segments.en: Erica, why don't you explain what Fluency Builder is?
segments.cn: 艾瑞卡，你能解释一下流利度构建器是什么吗？

segments.en: In Fluency Builder, we give you some great useful phrases to help you express your ideas clearly.
segments.cn: 在流利度构建器中，我们给你一些很有用的短语，帮助你清晰地表达你的想法。

segments.en: Okay, great.
So let's look at Fluency Builder.
segments.cn: 所以让我们看看流利度构建器。

segments.en: Fluency Builder.
Okay, so in this dialogue, we know his computer wasn't working.
segments.cn: 好的，在这个对话中，我们知道他的电脑不工作。

segments.en: Right.
So many students would probably say his computer was acting strangely.
segments.cn: 所以很多学生可能会说他的电脑表现得很奇怪。

segments.en: His computer isn't working properly.
Exactly.
And that's perfect.
And that's fine.
Yeah, but there's a really great way to say it that we heard in the dialogue.
segments.cn: 是的，但有一种很好的说法，我们在对话中听到了。

segments.en: It's acting up again.
It's acting up again.
I love this phrase.
It's acting up.
Yeah, it sounds really natural.
It sounds really natural.
Okay, we're ready to listen to our dialogue a third time.
segments.cn: 好的，我们准备好第三次听我们的对话了。

segments.en: But this time, it'll be at the normal speed.
Try and see if you can hear these key words.
segments.cn: 尝试看看你能否听到这些关键词。

segments.en: Oh, great.
The stupid computer froze again.
segments.cn: 这台愚蠢的电脑又卡住了。

segments.en: It's the third time today.
Hey, Samuel, can you come take a look at my PC?
segments.cn: 嘿，塞缪尔，你能来看看我的电脑吗？

segments.en: It's acting up again.
It must have a virus or something.
segments.cn: 可能有病毒或其他问题。

segments.en: Just give me a second.
I'll be right up.
I ran a virus scan on your computer.
segments.cn: 我对你的电脑进行了病毒扫描。

segments.en: And it turns out that you have a lot of infected files.
segments.cn: 结果你有很多感染的文件。

segments.en: But I'm quite careful when I'm browsing the Internet.
I have no idea how I could have picked up a virus.
segments.cn: 我不知道我怎么会感染病毒。

segments.en: Well, you have to make sure their antivirus software is updated regularly.
segments.cn: 嗯，你必须确保他们的防病毒软件定期更新。

segments.en: Yours wasn't up to date.
That's probably what was causing your problems.
segments.cn: 这可能是导致你问题的原因。

segments.en: Okay, anything else?
Yeah, try not to kick or hit the computer.
segments.cn: 是的，尽量不要踢或打电脑。

segments.en: Yeah, sorry about that.
So Marco, I really think that my computer actually has a virus now.
segments.cn: 所以马尔科，我真的觉得我的电脑现在有病毒。

segments.en: Really?
How come?
Because I have been turning on my computer, and then suddenly, it turns off by itself.
segments.cn: 因为我一直在开电脑，然后突然它自己关掉了。

segments.en: It shuts down by itself.
Yeah, that sounds like a virus.
segments.cn: 是的，这听起来像是病毒。

segments.en: But I ran a virus scan, and there was no problem.
segments.cn: 但我进行了病毒扫描，没有问题。

segments.en: Well, maybe your antivirus software isn't up to date.
segments.cn: 好吧，也许你的杀毒软件没有更新。

segments.en: Yeah, I guess I'd better call Samuel.
segments.cn: 是的，我想我最好打电话给塞缪尔。

segments.en: Yeah, you can call Samuel to fix it.
segments.cn: 是的，你可以打电话给塞缪尔来修理。

segments.en: Yeah.
All right, folks, we're out of time now.
segments.cn: 好吧，大家，我们现在没时间了。

segments.en: But be sure to go to our website at EnglishPod.com, where you can leave all your questions and comments.
segments.cn: 但一定要去我们的网站 EnglishPod.com，您可以留下所有问题和评论。

segments.en: So stay tuned for our next great lesson.
segments.cn: 所以请继续关注我们的下一堂精彩课程。

segments.en: And until next time, goodbye.
